html.body:
ML Tactic Notations These are the notations whose level and associativity are imposed by Coq
Notations for propositional connectives Notations for equality and inequalities Arithmetical notations (also used for type constructors) Notations for booleans Notations for pairs Notation "{ x }" is reserved and has a special status as component of other notations such as "{ A } + { B }" and "A + { B }" (which are at the same level as "x + y"); "{ x }" is at level 0 to factor with "{ x : A | P }" Notations for sigma-types or subsets Support for Gonthier-Ssreflect's "if c is pat then u else v"
Scopes
